rating_comment:
1. To begin the review, the hosts are awesome people, the hospitality they have to offer is top notch. The pros and cons are as listed below:
2. Pros
(a) Rooms from within are really well kept and well maintained. The touch of antique furniture enhances the beauty
(b) Nice ambience
(c) Nice collection of books
(d) Nice balcony.
(e) Well maintained washroom
3. Cons
(a) Locating the place is little difficult with google maps.
(b) Location is of residential area, which has many lanes running criss cross, the turns are sharp. Hence little difficult with sedans/ SUVs.
(c) Parking of vehicle is outside in the lane and since the lanes are narrow, reversing car and parking car becomes a hassle.
(d) if you are coming as a pet owner, and your pet needs area to roam around and freshen up, it will be difficult for you.
4. All in all the hospitality offered by the owners was fabulous, I really don’t have words to thank them for that, few cons to consider for other visitors.

It was a wonderful stay at RC Villa. Everything was delightful, and the owners were exceptionally polite. Uncle, in particular, was kind, polite, and cooperative. The room was beautifully appointed and worth every penny. Despite its affordability, it offered exceptional amenities that catered to my needs perfectly. The balcony was a peaceful haven with lush plants, ambient lighting, and captivating mandala art—a perfect setting to unwind in the evening, enjoying music or heartfelt conversations. Mornings were equally enchanting, with serene aesthetics and the melodious chirping of birds. I would rate my experience 11 out of 10—it was truly incredible. I look forward to revisiting this property whenever I'm in the city. Many thanks to the owners, including Uncle, Aunty, and their son, for their kindness and assistance.
Good behaviour, treated like family member. Sir was good at guiding and assisting for your plans.
Good place

I had a delightful stay at this Airbnb in Siliguri, which charmed me with its royal ambiance and beautifully crafted interiors. The wooden furnitures added a touch of elegance, complementing the overall aesthetic perfectly. The balcony was a personal favorite, adorned with vibrant plants and whimsical fairy lights, creating a magical evening atmosphere.
The host was incredibly welcoming and kind. Everything from check-in to check-out was seamless, thanks to their thoughtfulness and attention to detail.
I thoroughly enjoyed my peaceful retreat here and highly recommend it to anyone visiting Siliguri. Whether you’re seeking a quiet escape or a beautiful place to unwind, this Airbnb is truly a gem! ❤️

Swagata's place was excellent. The room was spacious , had lots of natural light and had all the privacy. Swagata and family were very resourceful and helped me with recommendations around Siliguri. I would definitely recommend the place to anyone.

The place is a must go if you are planning to stay in Siliguri. The place is aesthetically decorated and looks even better than portrayed in pictures. All the amenities are available. The location is perfect and places of visit are within 3 km radius. Lastly and most importantly the host is amazing and super responsive. Swagata son Souvik was in constant touch with us before check-in and his father was at the property to host us. Uncle is one of the USP of the property. He will look after you as your child while giving you adequate privacy. Super helpful and a big thank you to uncle for hosting us. Until next time!!😊
The hosts, Uncle and Aunty both were too sweet and helpful. They treated us like their kids! The room was exactly the way it is being shown on Airbnb. We really had a good time staying here.

The stay was very pleasant because uncle and aunty made us feel at home instantly. We stayed for one night as we had to take a flight next day. They both were very helpful and went out of their way to sort out things for us. Also I would strongly suggest to let them know if you wish to have any cab or transport as he has trusted people who can give you these services instead of booking something off google. It was indeed a home away from home and we loved our stay with them.
It was very good.

We had an amazing stay.The house is sparkling clean and same as shown in pics.The aesthetic gives u a positive vibe.Beautiful balcony welcomes u with plants and the mandala art.The plants are an additional treat to the soul !!! The hosts are very helpful.Host also helped us with finding good restaurants.They are very warm and welcoming.Lip smacking breakfast was served.Best place to stay in Siliguri.Trust me it's worth staying.

This is an amazingly beautiful place. A home away from home. The host was very cooperative and took great care of our needs.
I'll surely visit again, and highly recommending it.
It was a beautiful experience. The house was passionately decorated and conducive. Wishing the hosts the very best. We might visit again.

The beautiful smile of uncle was precedented by the love and generosity bestowed upon us. We rented the place for 3-4 days and this place just became a part of our happy memories. Only if words can describe our emotions .

Had the most peaceful time staying at this airbnb. The hosts are amazing from the get-go. Uncle helped park my vehicle, helped me with luggage. The breakfast each day was simple and tasty, as typical in bengali households. Lunch was available too on request and consisted of comfort bengali food.
The room is one of the best i have been in, very tastefully organized and designed. The balcony is huge and beautiful, such that one can happily spend hours in the peaceful surroundings.
Must visit again! Thanks to Kalyan Uncle and Swagata aunty for the welcome.
Beautiful place to stay in with great host
The place was very clean and peaceful. Owner was very friendly and helpful. Overall great experience, worth the penny.
A lovely easy stay at a quiet location in Siliguri - lovely helpful people, in a nice local neighbourhood. Thank you!
I discovered a second home away from home.. loved the hospitality.. overall it was an amazing experience.. Thank you for everything 🙏

Highly recommend this place if you are staying in Siliguri, more so if you have a pet with you. The place is stunning, you would love it. And more than the place, it is the family which hosts you who would win your heart. They are amazing people, always ready to help! I would keep coming back to this place.
Great place. Great host!
Swagata is a wonderful host. A sweet family and very helpful. They were warm and welcoming and the stay was peaceful.

A very beautiful place to stay. Far from the hustle bustle of the city, this is a stay where you can be lazy and enjoy the peace and comfort. A must stay place for any reader.
The location is a bit far from the one on the app but the hosts are very proactive and humble which makes it a place to come back again.
All in all a very good stay.

Forget about value-for-money, this place is the perfect example of value-exceeds-money. This is our second stay here, and we can hardly think of a better place to halt at Siliguri. It's 15 minutes from Siliguri station and 20 from NJP, and located close to Hongkong market. The location is private, yet very close to the Hongkong market. The room is pristine and artfully decorated with antique pieces, and has a lovely attached bath and a pretty veranda full of plants. However, the usp, as always, is the warm behaviour of uncle and aunty and the exceptional culinary skills of Swagata aunty. 1000/10.
